title: Small Cap Index To Provide Direction To The Markets
text:
Small Cap Index To Provide Direction To The Markets

Stock Market Today – 13th September 2019

The Cash market benchmark Index Small Cap is trading at 5570. On Thursday, 12th Sep the Index made a high of 5631 and closed at 5578. The Index has given an upside movement of 10% from its low of 5114 made on 23rd Aug. FMCG Food, Realty, Metals, Automobiles and Infra were the major performing sectors in this run. If Small Cap moves above 5631, then further upside movement can be seen in the Market.

Upcoming Events

1. There has been lots of hope on GST council meeting scheduled on 20th September 2019.

2. RBI will announce its monetary policy on 30th Sep 2019 which can be another trigger for the market.

3. On 18th Sep 2019 US Federal Reserve will announce its monetary policy.

For detailed open interest report, please download our app “Value Stocks”.

Sector Analysis:

Yesterday market ended in a negative note. Cement & Cement Products was the only major sector which has risen more than 1%. In minor sector, Carbon (3.04%), Airlines (1.77%) and Films (1.70%) has done quite well, rest had performed either flat or negative.

Top 5 companies were Everest Industries (11.14%), Tejas Networks (9.48%), Aptech (9.84%), Venkys India (8.80%) and IRB Infrastructure Developers (7.96%).

The US 10 Year T-Note is trading at 129.51. The Bond has crucial support at 117.42 made on 5th Nov 2018. The US Dollar Index is trading at 98.320.
